title: Spider-Man Across the Spider Verse Music Hides a Secret! 🕷️ #shorts
description:
Spider-Man Across the Spider-Verse hid a secret in its musical score. And not only in the recent movie, but also if you’ve watched any of the Spider-Man movies, whether its Tom Holland, Andrew Garfield, Tobey Maguire, or even the old ‘90s cartoons, you’ll notice a very similar theme across the Spider-Verse. Just listen…
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐

Sound Designer: Yosi Berman
